name: Simple-jeopardy-sketch
tagline: Simple sketch for an Arduino compatible Teensy 3.0 as an input device for a jeopardy game: 4 buttons, 4 LEDs and USB HID
body:
### Jeopardy
If you don't know the Jeopardy game, go look it up at Wikipedia: [Jeopardy!](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeopardy!)

### Display and game logic
To display the game, count points and all the cumbersome stuff Christian Lange's @chlange[/jeopardy](https://github.com/chlange/jeopardy) was used.
